alert.note: Alert for Allen; Beauregard; Rapides; Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued March 12 at 2:44AM CST until March 13 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST EARLY THIS MORNING... ...FREEZE WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM CST THIS EVENING TO 9 AM CDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...For the Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures 27 to 29 degrees expected. For the Wind Advisory, north winds 20 to 25 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * WHERE...In Louisiana, Vernon, Rapides, Beauregard and Allen Parishes. In Texas, Tyler, Hardin, Northern Jasper, Northern Newton, Southern Jasper and Southern Newton Counties. * WHEN...For the Freeze Warning, from 9 PM CST this evening to 9 AM CDT Sunday. For the Wind Advisory, until 6 AM CST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.
